column1: #text=I went to the library to borrow a book I needed for a research paper .
#text=I went inside the library and went to the section that contained the type of books I needed to do my research on .
#text=After finding the right section , I looked through the selections of books they had .
#text=I quicly looked through a few of the books to see what type of information they had .
#text=After finding the book I wanted to borrow I took it to the counter so I could check it out and borrow it for a few days .
#text=At the counter , the librarian asked for my library card .
#text=I took the library card out of my wallet and gave it to her .
#text=She collected my information and gave me the book and my library card .
#text=I then exited the library and took the book home .
#text=I am glad I had the library card because the book was really useful for helping me do my research paper .
